title: Apple has released iOS 15.4 to the public, hereâ€™s everything new
content:
Apple has finally released iOS 15.4 to the public worldwide. Unlike iOS 15.3, iOS 15.4 comes packed with new features, changes, and additions. These include support for Face ID when masked for iPhone 12 and newer models, a wide variety of new emoji, updates to Keychain, and much, much more. To download this update, you

The post Apple has released iOS 15.4 to the public, here’s everything new appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has released iOS 15.4 to the public globally. This significant update brings Face ID support when masked, new emoji, and much more.
